title: Trek remove 433,600 lbs of plastic waste from bike packaging
content:
Trek Bikes have slashed the amount of single-use plastic in bike packaging, removing an incredible 433,600 lbs of plastic waste from their supply chain. A custom approach, taking each bike model individually, has allowed Trek to make a massive step toward their goal of plastic-free packaging by 2024. Trek Cut Down on Plastic Packaging for [â€¦]
